nodes.text: The Sith rebellion was a failed rebellion by a sect of Jedi that were known as the Sith. The rebellion failed due to infighting and betrayal, and the rival feudal lords that were served by the Jedi in clashes. In the aftermath, the lords unified to form the Empire, with the Jedi being their most loyal servants.

The Sith rebellion was created as part of the backstory for the Star Wars: Visions short The Duel and its novel tie-in Ronin: A Visions Novel, set in an alternate history outside of Star Wars canon. Canonically, the Sith split off from the Jedi during a period known as the Hundred-Year Darkness, which led to a series of conflicts between the Jedi and Sith.
